summary: Combat Mage follower available in UNP & CBBE; with or without armor versions available.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1155cc][size=6][b][u]Merth[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[i][color=#c9daf8][size=2]Merth is on a journey to discover her past.  Her only clues are in a tattered journal.
The journal reads that the mages that raised her had actually kidnapped her
from a wealthy family.  When the ransom was not paid; the mages raised her as one of their own.
[/size][/color][/i][color=#c9daf8][i][size=2]Merth is now on the hunt to discover her true origins with the help of the Dragonborn.[/size][/i]
[/color]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/lpmb92gw7/20161119210951_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Merth
Race:  Custom Nord Race
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.05
Weight:  95
Body:  Base UNP & CBBE
Skin:  Demoniac
Armor:  Witch of the Wild (Tattoo Can Be Removed)
Weapons:  Vanilla Ebony Bow & Arrows
Weapons:  Fire & Ice Focus Spells
Location:  Whiterun - Arcadia's Cauldron (Upstairs Usually)

Class:  Combat Mage Elemental
Style:  Human Magic

Levels with player.  Nord/Breton Traits & Bonuses.
Skill bonuses:  Archery, Light Armor, All Schools of Magic
Perks:  Sneak, Light Armor, All Schools of Magic

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q54qebtaf/20161119212117_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
Skyrim & Update

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
